title: Rockin' Memphis Stay Near Iconic Graceland Mansion
description:
Experience a stay fit for the King of Rock ‘n’ Roll at The Guest House at Graceland, an extraordinary hotel a short walk from the iconic Graceland Mansion that was once the home of rock legend Elvis Presley. This sprawling hotel, ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor, boasts glitzy touches inspired by Elvis’ unique style along with exceptional and Southern hospitality to ensure a memorable Memphis stay.

Take a seat at one of the onsite restaurants or bars, catch a show at the 464-seat theatre for your live music and entertainment fix, or dive into the gleaming pool, then make your way through Memphis and explore the nearby sights. Music lovers can get lost among the endless museums and historic sites, including Sun Studio, the Memphis Music Hall of Fame, and Blues Hall of Fame, and foodies can sink their teeth into hearty Southern food, including smokey ribs or juicy fried chicken.
offer_address: 3600 Elvis Presley Blvd, Memphis, TN 38116, United States
